channel:
Heavy Rain Warning Meteorological Service Singapore
HEAVY RAIN WARNING
2 January 2016 - 11:55 LT
Heavy thundery showers with gusty wind are expected over southern, eastern & central areas of Singapore between 12:30pm and 1:30pm. PUB says flash floods may occur in the event of heavy rain. For flash floods updates, visit PUB Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PUBSg or PUB Twitter: http://twitter.com/PUBSingapore.
